homepageData.title: Sign up
homepageData.text: Create your account by providing your contact information to start your journey to better mental health today.

homepageData.title: Take our Assessment test
homepageData.text: Take our assessment test , to enable us provide you a customized service.

homepageData.title: Search for a therapist
homepageData.text: Browse through our community of licensed therapists, based on your location, language, and specialty. You can view the therapist's profile, ratings, and availability.

homepageDataTwo.title: Book a session
homepageDataTwo.text: Select a convenient time slot and book your first session with the therapist of your choice; in the most accessible and convenient way for everyone, anywhere, at any time.

homepageDataTwo.title: Start therapy
homepageDataTwo.text: Log into your account to join the video call with your therapist.  For in- office meetings, arrive 10-15 mins before your session. All sessions are encrypted and secure for privacy and confidentiality.

homepageDataTwo.title: Continue therapy
homepageDataTwo.text: Book and attend as many sessions as needed with different therapists after your very first session.Start your journey to better mental health today.

testimonials.testimonial: I was hesitant to try therapy, but my experience with Mindafrik has been life-changing. Their empathy and understanding has helped me work through my struggles and find peace within myself.

I've been seeing a therapist on Mindafrik for several months now and I can honestly say it's been a game-changer. Their approach is unique and tailored to my individual needs, and I've seen significant improvement in my mental health. I couldn't be happier with my experience.

I've been to several therapists in the past but never felt like I truly connected with them until I started seeing therapists at Mindafrik. They have a way of making me feel heard and understood, and I appreciate the non-judgmental space they provide. I'm grateful for their guidance and support.
